languages.text: "Рекомендация отклонена. Катехизис протоколов мог быть подвергнут искажению. Рекомендую следовать согласно стандартной процедуре разведки и очищения".
"Recommendation rejected. The catechism of protocols could have been distorted. Adherence to the standard procedure of reconnaissance and purification recommended."
languages.original_text: "Рекомендация отклонена. Катехизис протоколов мог быть подвергнут искажению. Рекомендую следовать согласно стандартной процедуре разведки и очищения".

traits.locale_text: "Recommendation rejected. The catechism of protocols could have been distorted. Adherence to the standard procedure of reconnaissance and purification recommended."
"Recommendation rejected. The catechism of protocols could have been distorted. Adherence to the standard procedure of reconnaissance and purification recommended."
"Recommendation rejected. The catechism of protocols could have been distorted. Adherence to the standard procedure of reconnaissance and purification recommended."
"Recommendation rejected. The catechism of protocols could have been distorted. Adherence to the standard procedure of reconnaissance and purification recommended."
"Recommendation rejected. The catechism of protocols could have been distorted. Adherence to the standard procedure of reconnaissance and purification recommended."

languages.text: 「推奨事項は却下。プロトコルのカテキズムは歪められている可能性があります。偵察と浄化の標準的手順への遵守を推奨します」
languages.original_text: "Recommendation rejected. The catechism of protocols could have been distorted. Adherence to the standard procedure of reconnaissance and purification recommended."

traits.locale_text: 「推奨事項は却下。プロトコルのカテキズムは歪められている可能性があります。偵察と浄化の標準的手順への遵守を推奨します」

languages.text: « Recommandation rejetée. Il est possible que le catéchisme des protocoles ait été déformé. Le respect de la procédure standard de reconnaissance et de purification est recommandé. »
languages.original_text: "Recommendation rejected. The catechism of protocols could have been distorted. Adherence to the standard procedure of reconnaissance and purification recommended."

traits.locale_text: « Recommandation rejetée. Il est possible que le catéchisme des protocoles ait été déformé. Le respect de la procédure standard de reconnaissance et de purification est recommandé. »

languages.text: “建议已驳回。协议的原则可能遭到了扭曲，建议按照侦察与净化相关的标准程序进行操作。”
languages.original_text: "Recommendation rejected. The catechism of protocols could have been distorted. Adherence to the standard procedure of reconnaissance and purification recommended."

traits.locale_text: “建议已驳回。协议的原则可能遭到了扭曲，建议按照侦察与净化相关的标准程序进行操作。”

languages.text: «Recomendación rechazada. El catecismo de los protocolos podría haberse visto distorsionado. Se recomienda la adopción del procedimiento estándar de reconocimiento y depuración».
languages.original_text: "Recommendation rejected. The catechism of protocols could have been distorted. Adherence to the standard procedure of reconnaissance and purification recommended."

traits.locale_text: «Recomendación rechazada. El catecismo de los protocolos podría haberse visto distorsionado. Se recomienda la adopción del procedimiento estándar de reconocimiento y depuración».

languages.text: "Empfehlung zurückgewiesen. Der Katechismus der Protokolle hätte verzerrt werden können. Einhaltung der Standardverfahren hinsichtlich Aufklärung und Läuterung empfohlen."
languages.original_text: "Recommendation rejected. The catechism of protocols could have been distorted. Adherence to the standard procedure of reconnaissance and purification recommended."

traits.locale_text: "Empfehlung zurückgewiesen. Der Katechismus der Protokolle hätte verzerrt werden können. Einhaltung der Standardverfahren hinsichtlich Aufklärung und Läuterung empfohlen."

languages.text: "Öneri reddedildi. Protokol ilmihâli bozulmuş olabilir. Standart keşif ve arındırma prosedürüne uyulması öneriliyor."
languages.original_text: "Recommendation rejected. The catechism of protocols could have been distorted. Adherence to the standard procedure of reconnaissance and purification recommended."

traits.locale_text: "Öneri reddedildi. Protokol ilmihâli bozulmuş olabilir. Standart keşif ve arındırma prosedürüne uyulması öneriliyor."
